text: gudugu avana (allahana) pavitravannu japisutta avana gunagana maduttade. Malakâ€Œgalu bhaktiyondige (idanne maduttiruttare). Avane, abbarisuva sidilannu kalisuttane mattu tanicchisidavara mele adannu bilisuttane. Avaru (dhikkarigalu) allahana visayadalli jagaladuttare. Avanu bahala kathoravagi hidiyuvavanagiddane
